alert.note: Alert for Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Marinette, east central Menominee and central Oconto Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 120 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of McCaslin Mountain Natural Area to 7 miles east of Bear Paw Scout Camp to near South Branch. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crivitz and Wausaukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
